TopicTitle: Looking for help saving craft in world I forgot to save...for editor later

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

I created a nice little rover...probably not very cool by most peoples standards.

I took it out for a spin and its pretty cool and working like I wanted.

Well then I went back to space center and launched a command pod so there would be kerbals and EVA them to the rover to climb into the seat :D

SUCCESS

..............

except.........

I never saved my rover in assembly /facepalm

Since I've switched vessels I can't revert to assembly room.

I tried copy/pasting the parts list in the persistent file to another rover in hopes of saving the crafts parts and reload it in editor.

But I've never really done that before.

I wonder if anyone could help me.

Here is the persistent file

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ld1em7fsogo5f3f/persistent.sfs

The spacecraft I'm trying to save so I'll be able to load it again in editor is Rover1

I figure this is easy for someone....just not me.

Thanks in advance for anyone that can help
If you're lucky, it will still be the auto saved ship in the editor.

If you're lucky, it will still be the auto saved ship in the editor.

It was not
